body: Lol what the title says I can't connect to avicus any tips to help me connect

title: Help me connect

replies.body: Can you connect to other servers? (Stupid question but anyways) Can you try connecting from a different computer on the same network?

If you are floating in the lobby just be patient the server will load up

replies.body: Deleting avicus and adding it back didn't not work oddly though it connects (it shows the bars connect) but it still says connection lost when i click join installing mc will be the last thing i will do but i think it could lead to that thank you any other ideas?
